import * as React from "react"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

function Textarea({ className, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"textarea">) {
  return (
    <textarea
      data-slot="textarea"
      className={cn(
        "flex min-h-[120px] w-full",
        "rounded-base border-3 border-border",
        "bg-secondary-background",
        "shadow-shadow-sm",
        "px-3 py-2",
        "text-sm font-base text-foreground",
        "placeholder:text-foreground/50",
        "selection:bg-main selection:text-main-foreground",
        "transition-shadow",
        "hover:shadow-shadow",
        "focus-visible:outline-hidden focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-main focus-visible:ring-offset-2 focus-visible:ring-offset-background",
        "disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 disabled:shadow-none",
        "resize-y",
        className,
      )}
      {...props}
    />
  )
}

export { Textarea }
